title: Top 5 Most Valuable Data Companies in the World
text: In this article, we discuss the Top 5 Most Valuable Data Companies in the World. If you want to check out our detailed analysis, go directly to Top 20 Most Valuable Data Companies in the World. They also build powerful CRM technology for nonprofits, educational institutions, and philanthropic organizations, in order for them to increase their social impact. Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE: CRM) has collaborated on the new Teamcenter SLM app which is meant to allow manufacturers to use more service-centrist business models and increase experience and their revenue. They have made a name for themselves in the data market and therefore, are among the most valuable data companies of the world.
